channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: How Civil Society Exposes the Human Rights Risks of the Digital Silk Road
item.description: Emboldened authoritarian actors are no longer content to repress human rights in their own countries, but feel confident in their ability to share their tacticsÂ and technology across borders. Local civil society organizations stand at the front line against these mounting threats.
